IMG_20100923_154846_descr: \"HERE IN THE PRESENCE OF WASHINGTON AND LINCOLN, ONE THE EIGHTEENTH CENTURY FATHER AND THE OTHER THE NINETEENTH CENTURY PRESERVER OF OUR NATION. WE HONOR THOSE TWENTIETH CENTURY AMERICANS WHO TOOK UP THE STRUGGLE DURING THE SECOND WORLD WAR AND MADE THE SACRIFICES TO PERPETUATE THE GIFT OUR FOREFATHERS ENTRUSTED TO US: a NATION CONCEIVED IN LIBERTY AND JUSTICE\"
IMG_20100923_155004_descr: \"THEY FOUGHT TOGETHER AS BROTHERS-IN-ARMS. THEY DIED TOGETHER AND NOW THEY SLEEP SIDE BY SIDE. TO THEM WE HAVE A SOLEMN OBLIGATION\" - ADMIRAL CHESTER W. NIMITZ
IMG_20100923_155035_descr: \"WOMEN WHO STEPPED UP WERE MEASURED AS CITIZENS OF THE NATION, NOT AS WOMEN. THIS WAS A PEOPLE\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\'S WAR AND EVERYONE WAS IN IT.\" --COLONEL OVETA CULP HOBBY
IMG_20100924_110918_descr: \"THE LAST HOPE OF HUMAN LIBERTY RESTS WITH US\" - Thomas Jefferson,  1811
IMG_20100924_110928_descr: \"EQUAL AND EXACT JUSTICE TO ALL MEN, OF WHATEVER STATE OR PERSUASION, RELIGIOUS OR POLITICAL\", Thomas Jefferson, 1801, First Inaugural Address
